an5.151:1.1: “Mendicants, someone with five qualities is unable to enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities even when listening to the true teaching.
an5.151:1.3: They disparage the talk, the speaker, or themselves. They listen with distracted and scattered mind. They attend improperly.
an5.151:1.4: Someone with these five qualities is unable to enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities, even when listening to the true teaching.
an5.151:2.1: Someone with five qualities is able to enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities when listening to the true teaching.
an5.151:2.3: They don’t disparage the talk, the speaker, or themselves. They listen with undistracted and unified mind. They attend properly.
an5.151:2.4: Someone with these five qualities is able to enter the sure path with regards to skillful qualities when listening to the true teaching.”
